#!/bin/bash
if [ ! -e /Library/Internet\ Plug-Ins/JavaAppletPlugin.plugin ] ; then exit 0 fi
VERSION=`defaults read /Library/Internet\ Plug-Ins/JavaAppletPlugin.plugin/Contents/Info CFBundleVersion | cut -d. -f1` VERSION2=`defaults read /Library/Internet\ Plug-Ins/JavaAppletPlugin.plugin/Contents/Info CFBundleVersion | cut -d. -f1,2` VERSION3=`defaults read /Library/Internet\ Plug-Ins/JavaAppletPlugin.plugin/Contents/Info CFBundleVersion | cut -d. -f3`
if [ $VERSION -ge 14 ] ; then exit 0 fi
RESULT=`echo "$VERSION2 < 1.7" | bc` if [ $RESULT -eq 1 ] ; then exit 0 fi
RESULT=`echo "$VERSION2 == 1.7" | bc` if [ $RESULT -eq 1 ] ; then echo "version 1.7" if [ $VERSION3 -lt 60 ]; then exit 0 fi fi exit 1

#!/bin/sh rm -rf /Library/Internet\ Plug-Ins/JavaAppletPlugin.plugin ln -sf /System/Library/Java/Support/Deploy.bundle/Contents/Resources/JavaPlugin2_NPAPI.plugin /Library/Internet\ Plug-Ins/JavaAppletPlugin.plugin ln -sf /System/Library/Frameworks/JavaVM.framework/Commands/javaws /usr/bin/javaws
exit 0
